PRESS RELEASE: Roberts: Hold Remains Absent White House Assurance Not to Send #GITMO Terrorists to Kansas https://t.co/l7BcxEWsXc
ICYMI here is my speech on the Fanning nom & WH refusal to assure me no terrorists from #GITMO will be sent to KS. https://t.co/LFpL5qXRfr
If the plans from the administration rule out Ft. Leavenworth as an option for the relocation of #GITMO, all they have to do is tell me.
But make no mistake, I remain adamantly opposed to placing #GITMO detainees anywhere on the U.S. mainland.
It is what Kansans expect and have demanded of me.
This hold is one of the tools afforded to me as a US Senator & I will do everything in my power to protect the national security of the U.S.
All I am asking is for the @WhiteHouse to assure me Ft. Leavenworth is NOT a viable alternative.
I have reviewed the latest assessment & it's apparent that it’s virtually impossible to safely relocate terrorists to Ft. Leavenworth
The admin. refused to come forward w/ a real plan to re-locate the prisoners, instead of a weak attempt to honor a campaign promise.
We should be angry at the @WhiteHouse that intends to ignore laws & wants to bring terrorists to our shores.
w/ the threat of executive order, I have little choice but to do what I can to block the transfer of #GITMO detainees to Ft. Leavenworth.
After much study & review, I can name you countless reasons why this plan is wrong. It is also illegal, which @POTUS' cabinet acknowledges.
He insists on transferring the remaining #GITMO detainees to a site on the US the mainland, w/ Ft. Leavenworth under serious consideration.
As I have publicly stated from the beginning, my issue is not w/ the nominee, but w/ POTUS who continues to insist on closing #GITMO this yr
It is my deep respect & concern for our men & women in uniform & all those at Ft. Leavenworth that has compelled me to hold @POTUS' nominee.
I support Fanning to be Secretary of the @USArmy. KS is the proud home to 2 Army posts &I want the Army to have a highly-qualified Secretary
SPEAKING NOW on the floor on the Fanning nomination & @POTUS’ plan to close #GITMO & bring terrorists to the mainland.

If #EveryChildAchieves becomes law, we can finally say goodbye to federal interference in what we teach our kids in school.
We need to get the federal government out of the classroom, and return community decisions back to where they belong - in the community.
Setting high standards for our schools, our teachers & our children is the right thing to do, but we will decide those standards in Kansas.
#EveryChildAchieves will prohibit the federal government’s role and involvement in #CommonCore & preserve state autonomy in education.
#EveryChildAchieves will end the Obama Administration’s use of waivers to force or incentivize states to adopt #CommonCore standards.
#EveryChildAchieves puts an end to Washington mandates & allows Kansans to make their own decisions about the best way to improve education
